resources.string: Make sure you select something you \nwill remember. If you forgot your \npasscode it will be unretrievable.

string.name: terms_data
string.Data:
1. GENERAL

1.1. By installing the Application also referred to as the "Peeki, App, app", you agree to be bound by these terms of use (" Appterms "). Please review them carefully before installation and/or acceptance. The user shall purchase and download the Application subject to the terms and conditions set out by Peeki.

1.2. Peeki may amend the Application Terms and Conditions at any time at its sole discretion. Peeki will notify users of and/or publicly announce such amendment in the reasonable manner as determined by Peeki.

1.3. Except otherwise specified by Peeki, user's continued use of the Application one week after the receipt of such notice by user or such Peeki's announcement, whichever comes first will reaffirm its agreement to be bound and to abide by the Application Terms and Conditions as amended.

2. PASSWORD PROTECTION

2.1. The user will have sole control over the password. The user can change the password at any time using the change password feature in the app menu. If the user forgets the password they will not be able access certain app functions. Peeki does not store or collect passwords and is not responsible for the user password.

2.2. Peeki will not be able to retrieve the user's password if the user forgets it.

2.3. User will be solely responsible for storing of the password and the downloaded Application.

3. DATA PROTECTION

3.1. The Application does not store or collect any personal data from the user. The app is an offline app and once downloaded the app will be fully functional offline and no online server connection will be required.

3.2. The user can share images using the share Facebook feature. Peeki will not be responsible or accountable for any images shared through the share feature.

3.3. Any personal information you supply to Peeki when using the Application will only be used by Peeki or Third Parties to (i) identify the user so that we can (ii) resolve a genuine query or service problem regarding the Application.

3.4. Peeki is committed to protecting your privacy, and takes its responsibilities regarding the security of customer information very seriously.

4. CONDITIONS OF USE

4.1. You agree not to violate, nor allow third parties on your behalf to make and distribute copies of the Application attempt to copy, reproduce, alter, modify, reverse engineer, disassemble, decompile, transfer, exchange or translate the Application; or tamper with any element of the security framework/code, or to attempt or assist another person to do so, or create derivative works of the Application of any kind whatsoever.

4.2. Peeki grants you the non-exclusive, non-transferable, limited right and license to install and use this Application solely and exclusively for your personal use.

4.3. Peeki may without any prior notice to users, update, add, or change the Application or suspend or terminate the provision of the Application.

4.4. You acknowledge that the terms of agreement with your respective mobile network provider ( 'Mobile Provider ') will continue to apply when downloading the Application. As a result, you may be charged by the Mobile Provider for access to network connection services for the duration of the connection while downloading the Application. You accept responsibility for any such charges that arise from downloading the Application.

4.5. If you are not the bill payer for the mobile telephone or handheld device being used to download the Application, you will be assumed to have received permission from the bill payer for downloading the Application.

5. PROPRIETARY RIGHTS AND LICENCE

"Intellectual Property Rights" means any and all rights existing from time to time under patent law, copyright law, trade secret law, remove, obscure, or alter the Application or any third party's copyright notices, trademarks, design, app code or other proprietary rights notices affixed to or contained within or accessed in conjunction with or through the Application.

5.1. All trademarks, copyright, database rights and other intellectual property rights of any nature in the Application together with the underlying software code are owned either directly by Peeki or by third parties that own such rights.

5.2. Peeki hereby grants you a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free revocable licence to use the Application for your personal use in accordance with these app terms.

5.3. The Application shall not be transferrable to any third parties.

5.4. You acknowledge that (a) the Application contains proprietary and confidential information that is protected by applicable intellectual property and other laws, and (b) Peeki and/or third parties own all right, title and interest in and to the Application and content, excluding content provided by you, that may be presented or accessed through the Application, including without limitation all Intellectual Property Rights therein and thereto trademark law, unfair competition law, and any and all other proprietary rights, and any and all Applications, renewals, extensions and restorations thereof, now or hereafter in force and effect worldwide.

6. AVAILABILITY

6.1. This Application is available to handheld mobile devices running Apple iOS and Android OS Operating Systems. Peeki will use reasonable efforts to make the Application available at all times. However you acknowledge the Application is provided over the internet and mobile networks and so the quality and availability of the Application may be affected by factors outside Peeki's reasonable control.

6.2. Peeki and its third party developers do not accept any responsibility whatsoever for unavailability of the Application, or any difficulty or inability to download or access content or any other communication system failure which may result in the Application being unavailable.

6.3. Once you have downloaded the Application we will not be responsible for any support or maintenance for the Application as it will be an offline Application. However we encourage user feedback and will constantly strive towards perfecting our Application to create the best in user experience.

6.4. The Application Software contains source code owned by Peeki and its developers and cannot copied, altered, distributed without a granted license approved by Peeki or its developers / third parties ("Third party software developers").

7. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

7.1. In order to use the Application, you are required to have a compatible mobile telephone or handheld device and the necessary minimum specifications ('Software Requirements').

7.2. The Application is designed for Apple iOS devices and Android OS devices, Language: English.

7.3. The version of the Application software may be upgraded from time to time to add support for new functions and services.

7.4. New app versions or upgrade app versions will require the user to uninstall the previous version of the app and download the new app version or app upgrade.

7.5. The user will be charged for any upgrades in accordance with the standard Application download/upgrade purchase fee. Before any Application download/upgrade is possible the user will have to approve the purchase fee through one of our approved affiliates.

8. TERMINATION

8.1. Peeki may terminate use of the Application or Application upgrades at any time without giving prior notice of termination to you.

8.2. Upon any termination, (a) the rights and licenses granted to you herein shall terminate; (b) you must cease all use of the Software;

9. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY

9.1. In no event will Peeki be liable for any direct, indirect, special, punitive, exemplary or consequential losses or damages of whatsoever kind arising out of your use or access to the Application, including loss of profit or the like whether or not in the contemplation of the parties, whether based on breach of contract, tort (including negligence), product liability or otherwise.

9.2. Peeki is not liable to you for any damage or alteration to your equipment including but not limited to computer equipment, handheld device or mobile telephones as a result of the installation or use of the Application.

9.3. Nothing in these Appterms shall exclude or limit Peeki's liability for death or personal injury caused by negligence or for fraud or fraudulent misrepresentation or any other liability which cannot be excluded or limited under applicable law.

10. DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES

10.1. You expressly understand and agree that your use of the application is at your sole discretion and risk and that the application is provided as is and as available without warranty of any kind.

10.2. You are solely responsible for any damage to your mobile device, or other device, or loss of data that results from such use.

10.3. The company further expressly disclaims all warranties and conditions of any kind, whether express or implied, including, but not limited to the implied warranties and conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose and non-infringement, with respect to the application.
